amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds for the transport, release, or assistance in the transfer or release of any Guantanamo detainee housed in Cuba on or after December 31, 2005.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to amend Sec. 533 of the bill to apply to detainees held at Guantanamo Bay on or after December 31, 2005 instead of June 24, 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 261 (Roll no. 200).
